DOC.brief_summary: The study aimed to determine the emotional reactivity of depressed patients to visual and olfactory stimuli in comparison with healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Olfactory and Visual Perception in Depressed Patients
DOC.criteria: no cognitive impairment that could prevent instruction comprehension no more than 10 cigarettes/day signed informed consent group 1: current major depressive disorder group 2: no current major depressive disorder pregnancy visual impairment olfactory impairment
